topic.title: Is it possible to build a site like Sci-Hub (https://sci-hub.se/)
topic.body:
We fight inequality in knowledge access across the world. The scientific knowledge should be available for every person regardless of their income, social status, geographical location and etc.
Our mission is to remove any barrier which impeding the widest possible distribution of knowledge in human society!

topic.title: Unlock all zites in 7 steps
topic.body:
1. Enter your Linux system as root user
2. Make sure your PC or VPS has installed sqlite3 and curl
3. Make sure you have visted the site `1LtvsjbtQ2tY7SCtCZzC4KhErqEK3bXD4n`
4. run `vi seedall.sh`
5. write and save (change the `ZERO_DIR`,`ZERO_HOST`,and `HOST_PORT`, if neccessary )

```
#!/bin/sh

ZERO_DIR=~/ZeroNet-master
ZERO_HOST=127.0.0.1
HOST_PORT=43110
APP_ID=1LtvsjbtQ2tY7SCtCZzC4KhErqEK3bXD4n

ALL_SITES=`sqlite3 $ZERO_DIR/data/$APP_ID/data/zerosites.db "select address from sites;"`
for SITE in $ALL_SITES; do
    echo Check site $SITE
    curl -H "Accept: text/html" --silent http://$ZERO_HOST:$HOST_PORT/$SITE > /dev/null
done
```
6. run `chmod 777 seedall.sh`
7. run `./seedall.sh`

1547790597_1PqrpogAwPjPf9T7bJjWWAjzTaRQc.body:
> [n4n0](#comment_10_1Q3jT2vtT4gYV1rZqAvDrRzEPeXH9S7T6M): Why would you do this tho? It would essentially also make you seed questionable content to say the least.

Just help to seed sites and make best  use of your vps. And let the new zeronetter know that the community is friendly to them and would help them seed  their crude or stupid sites. Just 10 MB space may stick one new zeronetter.

> [quantumworld](#comment_160_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): Do you know how much that data might be? I would never run that script.

Most of sites is dead. I test that, and it use about 10GB of my space.

> [quantumworld](#comment_161_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): This is just really bad advice to any newbie zeronet Linux user.DO NOT RUN THIS SCRIPT!It is the making for a disaster. Let alone that some Zite could create code that could access /root on your system in  a form of a script file using python. I would bet that the author has already created such a site and is waiting for any newbies to run this script and gain access to there entire Linux system. [...]

It is impossible to run personal python code, all zite  just run js and zeroframe api. Also I just seed but never open those zite. Your words scare me but it is impossible.

1553283983_19XCfah7iuo9zYqk7GoTDXVNp4p5B.body:
> [pineapples](#comment_17_19XCfah7iuo9zYqk7GoTDXVNp4p5BpEH1T): so if the trackers went down then would zeronet go down as well or would you still be able to see new content from peers that you have already connected to but not be able to find new peers?

no, you still can connect to new peers through `peer exchange` function if all trackers are down.

If, however, this happens to be because of something else, then I'll look further into this. But I will likely not be able to do anything about this till this ZeroNet bug is fixed.

In kxovid, the video is `preload="metadata"`, which means when I visit that video page but donot click that video, the video will be downloaded automatically. It should be `preload="none"`.
